resources.string:
Instructions:

 To Start game you have to scan QR code at starting point which will show the code. you need to solve it by your logical, programming skills. The answer will show you the number of next location. You need to follow the map, go there find the next QR code and repeat util you win.
Time will be notice by application once you hit Start.
Once you solve it, Answer will show you the next location.\n follow Map\npress next and scan clue from next location
